33#include <sys/cdefs.h>
34__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: drm_global.c,v 1.4 2018/08/27 04:58:19 riastradh Exp $");
35
36#include <linux/mutex.h>
37#include <linux/slab.h>
38#include <linux/module.h>
39#include <linux/kernel.h>
40#include <linux/export.h>
41#include <asm/bug.h>
42#include <drm/drm_global.h>
43
44struct drm_global_item {
45 struct mutex mutex;
46 void *object;
47 int refcount;
48};
49
50static struct drm_global_item glob[DRM_GLOBAL_NUM];
51
52void drm_global_init(void)
53{
54 int i;
55
56 for (i = 0; i < DRM_GLOBAL_NUM; ++i) {
57 struct drm_global_item *item = &glob[i];
58#ifdef __NetBSD__
59 linux_mutex_init(&item->mutex);
60#else
61 mutex_init(&item->mutex);
62#endif
63 item->object = NULL;
64 item->refcount = 0;
65 }
66}
67
68void drm_global_release(void)
69{
70 int i;
71 for (i = 0; i < DRM_GLOBAL_NUM; ++i) {
72 struct drm_global_item *item = &glob[i];
73 (void)item; /* ignore */
74 BUG_ON(item->object != NULL);
75 BUG_ON(item->refcount != 0);
76 }
77}
78
79int drm_global_item_ref(struct drm_global_reference *ref)
80{
81 int ret;
82 struct drm_global_item *item = &glob[ref->global_type];
83
84 mutex_lock(&item->mutex);
85 if (item->refcount == 0) {
86 item->object = kzalloc(ref->size, GFP_KERNEL);
87 if (unlikely(item->object == NULL)) {
88 ret = -ENOMEM;
89 goto out_err;
90 }
91
92 ref->object = item->object;
93 ret = ref->init(ref);
94 if (unlikely(ret != 0))
95 goto out_err;
96
97 }
98 ++item->refcount;
99 ref->object = item->object;
100 mutex_unlock(&item->mutex);
101 return 0;
102out_err:
103 mutex_unlock(&item->mutex);
104 item->object = NULL;
105 return ret;
106}
107EXPORT_SYMBOL(drm_global_item_ref);
108
109void drm_global_item_unref(struct drm_global_reference *ref)
110{
111 struct drm_global_item *item = &glob[ref->global_type];
112
113 mutex_lock(&item->mutex);
114 BUG_ON(item->refcount == 0);
115 BUG_ON(ref->object != item->object);
116 if (--item->refcount == 0) {
117 ref->release(ref);
118 item->object = NULL;
119 }
120 mutex_unlock(&item->mutex);
121}
122EXPORT_SYMBOL(drm_global_item_unref);
123
